name: Blackthorne
description:
Blackthorne is an action-arcade game developed by Mass Media, 32X and Paradox. It came out on 01-01-1994. It was published by Interplay Productions. Blackthorne has a Metascore of 67, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Blackthorne is available on PC, Game Boy Advance, Classic Macintosh and SNES.
Matthew Findley and Ronald Millar Sr. produced the game. It was scored by Glenn Stafford.
